title: How to Use the ITACC Ship in ROBLOX

steps.headline: Approach the door.
steps.description: The door can only be opened or closed inside the ship. When you walk under the doorway and into the ship, you will see a red bar on the top of the doorway's interior side. Click that to open and close the door.

steps.headline: Walk all the way back of the ship where there will be a room on your left side.
steps.description: Walk in and sit on the green seat. Then, zoom out (so you can see the ship and where it's going) and you will see buttons on the screen.

steps.headline: Move with the movement controls.
steps.description: You can use the W, A, S, D controls or the arrow keys. They represent Up, Down, Hover, and All Stop. Up will make the ship continuously go up until you press another button. Down will continuously make the ship go down until you press another button. Hover will continuously make the ship hover until you press another button. All Stop will continuously stop the ship from moving until you press another button.

text: Approach the door. The door can only be opened or closed inside the ship. When you walk under the doorway and into the ship, you will see a red bar on the top of the doorway's interior side. Click that to open and close the door. Walk all the way back of the ship where there will be a room on your left side. Walk in and sit on the green seat. Then, zoom out (so you can see the ship and where it's going) and you will see buttons on the screen. Move with the movement controls. You can use the W, A, S, D controls or the arrow keys. They represent Up, Down, Hover, and All Stop. Up will make the ship continuously go up until you press another button. Down will continuously make the ship go down until you press another button. Hover will continuously make the ship hover until you press another button. All Stop will continuously stop the ship from moving until you press another button.
